# FDA safety review of abortion pill may extend past midterms, infuriating pro-life bankroller

DOJ accuses Louisiana AG, alleged victim of abortion coercion of trying to "short circuit" FDA's review of mifepristone's loosened rules. "Trump-Vance administration" foot-dragging will hurt GOP in midterms, major primary spender says.

Abortion health information • An induced abortion is a procedure to end a pregnancy. It can be done two different ways: Medication abortion (also called medical abortion) and Procedural abortion. An induced abortion is different from a spontaneous abortion. That is the loss of a pregnancy before the 20th week of pregnancy. It is more commonly known as a miscarriage.
